body:
The texlive distribution seems to roll out new tarballs at the drop of a hat.

I thought about just deleting the digest and treating it like 'develop' (even renaming the version) but URLFetchStrategy seems to insist on a digest.

So two questions:

1. is there a directive/interface that I can use to specify "Here is the URL for a tarball, it's untrusted."

2. Should I, or should we just keep trying to keep up with them?  The distribution is called Tex*live*, after all...
title: Can I use URLFetchStrategy w/out a checksum?
